name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-teams-membership-updater
title: Teams Membership Updater
shortDescription: Used to update the membership of a team based on the contents of a CSV file, can be hosted in a SharePoint site where a list can be defined for logging purposes or run inside teams as a personal app.
longDescription: Used to update the membership of a team based on the contents of a CSV file, can be hosted in a SharePoint site where a list can be defined for logging purposes or run inside teams as a personal app.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
